project_info.name: agenticSeek
project_info.description: AgenticSeek is a project that uses AI to seek information, functioning as a local alternative to Manus AI, with capabilities for autonomous browsing, coding, and task planning.

core_features.description: A fully local AI that autonomously browses the web, writes code, and plans tasks while ensuring data privacy.
Automatically selects the best agent for specific tasks based on user input.
Capable of splitting complex tasks into manageable steps and executing them autonomously.
